sentences.en: an insurance policy against long-term sickness and injury
sentences.cn: 保长期患病和受伤的保险单

sentences.en: By the side of sickness health becomes sweet.
sentences.cn: 与疾病相比,健康才显得可爱.

sentences.en: Don't hide your sickness for fear of treatment.
He didn't attend that meeting under the pretext of sickness.
sentences.cn: 他以生病为借口,没参加那个会议.

sentences.en: He felt a great rush of sickness.
He put up a good fight against his sickness.
sentences.cn: 他同疾病作顽强的斗争.

sentences.en: In fifty-two years of working he had one week of sickness.
sentences.cn: 在52年的工作中他仅病过一周。

sentences.en: Liam had suffered violent sickness and diarrhoea.
Many women experience sickness during pregnancy .
sentences.cn: 许多妇女在怀孕期都会有恶心现象。

sentences.en: Several workers complained of feelings of sickness and headaches.
sentences.cn: 几个工人表示感到恶心、头痛.

sentences.en: She tried to thrust back the little stabs of home - sickness.
sentences.cn: 她努力排遣涌上心头的思乡之情.

sentences.en: Sickness deprived me of the pleasure of meeting you.
sentences.cn: 疾病使得我未能和你经常欢聚.

sentences.en: Sickness often results from eating too much.
sentences.cn: 呕吐常因饮食过量所致.

sentences.en: The contributions employees pay give cover against sickness, including chronic invalidity.
sentences.cn: 员工的定期缴款用来支付生病的花费，包括长期病残的开销。

sentences.en: The physician made a prescription against sea - sickness for him.
sentences.cn: 医生给他开了个治晕船的药方.

sentences.en: They were disabled by age or sickness.
sentences.cn: 他们因年老或疾病而失去了工作的能力.

sentences.en: Think carefully before you insure against accident, sickness and redundancy.
sentences.cn: 在为意外事故、疾病与失业投保之前一定要考虑清楚。

sentences.en: working days lost due to sickness
